attributes.action: Make it ellegal for companies to put pre employment questionairs on job application forms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People with medical problems are being discriminated against, because they have to list all their medical conditions on job application forms.
Its obvious that employers are going to reject someone with a list of medical problems and employ those that appear healthy.
medicals should be done after interview.
